entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
